content: this darling diamonds blanket pattern is worked in row and is an absolute delight to crochet with clearly written instructions and x-marked chart the repeating pattern can easily be made to suit your needs **technique ** overlay mosaic **experience level ** confident beginner **pattern repeat ** multiples of 20+3 **yardage** for a throw approximately 50x60 color a background 2650 color b detail 1660 *yardage does not include border or tails/fringe and is approximated based on worsted weight yarn and 4 5mm hook your own gauge affects how much yardage your project will require * **terminology ** us **language ** english **pattern length ** 4 pages **pattern includes** * written instructions * x-marked chart with legend * envelope border resource link **testers ** jacqui ducker tina milledge and jean osprey a very special thank you ladies **permissions ** you have my permission to sell anything you make from my pattern darling diamonds is ©2024 by april whited do not copy or distribute this pattern in part or whole in any form of media for profit or free do not include this pattern in a materials kit or pattern compilation of any kind do not alter the pattern and claim as your own do not translate this pattern to other languages without my permission digital sales are not refundable exchangeable and cannot be cancelled if you need assistance with your order please contact me
